tiles.markdownText:
# Lock Timeouts

*“The operation could not complete because a record in the [table name] table was locked by another user. Please retry the activity.”*

# Deadlocks

*“The activity was deadlocked with another user who was modifying the [table name] table. Please retry the activity.”*

queries.text:
Base_Customers
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.environmentType)
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.companyName)
| extend companyName = tostring(customDimensions.companyName)
| extend environmentName = tostring(customDimensions.environmentName)
| extend IsSaas  = iff(isempty(environmentName) or environmentName in ('common','null','default','undefined'),false,true)
| extend environmentType = iff(tobool(IsSaas),tostring(customDimensions.environmentType), 
                                iff(isempty(environmentName) or environmentName in ('common','null','default','undefined'),'OnPrem','SaaS'))
| where environmentType == 'Production'
    or (environmentName !contains 'TEST'
    and environmentName !contains 'QA'
    and environmentName !contains 'TRAINING')
| summarize count() by aadTenantId, tenantDescription, companyName, environmentName, environmentType, IsSaas
| order by IsSaas
| where companyName contains _CompanyFilter

traces
| where timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime) // Parameter usage
| where message contains _MessageFilter            // Parameter usage
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.eventId)
| extend eventId = tostring(customDimensions.eventId)
| extend shortMessage = iif(substring(message, 0, 4) == "Task", "Task Executed",  //String manipulation 
                    iif(eventId == "AL0000JRG", "Job Queue Error",
                        iff(indexof(message, ":") <= 0, message, substring(message, 0, indexof(message, ":")))))
| extend status = //String manipulation 
    iif(shortMessage has_any ("called","executed","succeeded","rendered","successfully","success","opened", "added", "started", "finished", "Used","enqueued"),"success",
        iif(shortMessage has_any ("error","fail","failed","deadlock","timed out"), "error",
            iif(shortMessage has_any ("exceeded"),'too slow',
                "unknown")))
| summarize count = count() by tostring(eventId), tostring(shortMessage), status
| order by ['count'] desc

Base_Customers
| extend shortMessage = iif(substring(message, 0, 4) == "Task", "Task Executed",  //Remove ID's from message
                    iif(eventId == "AL0000JRG", "Job Queue Error",
                        iff(indexof(message, ":") <= 0, message, substring(message, 0, indexof(message, ":")))))
| extend status = //Come up with a status
    iif(shortMessage has_any ("called","executed","succeeded","rendered","successfully","success","opened", "added", "started", "finished"),"success",
        iif(shortMessage has_any ("error","fail","failed","deadlock","timed out"), "error",
            iif(shortMessage has_any ("exceeded"),'too slow',
                "unknown")))
| summarize count = count() by tostring(eventId), tostring(shortMessage), status
| extend LearnUrl = strcat("https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/search/?scope=BusinessCentral&terms=",eventId, "+", replace_string(shortMessage," ","+"))
| project eventId, shortMessage, status, count, LearnUrl
| order by ['count'] desc

externaldata(eventId :string, eventArea:string, eventDescription:string)
        [h@'https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/0oh1kxqldoq6ujf5u45g7/Signals.json?rlkey=057i56lcivyxh0f8pcwq6fcfv&dl=1']
            with(format='multijson')
| where eventDescription contains _MessageFilter
| where eventArea has_any (_Area);

Base_Customers
| where eventArea has_any (_Area)     //drop-down list of all Areas
| summarize count = count() by tostring(eventId), eventArea, eventDescription
| project eventId, count, eventArea, eventDescription
| order by ['count'] desc

//Custom Events in the base app
traces
| where timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where customDimensions.eventId startswith "AL"    //all events raised in AL, start with "AL"
| where customDimensions.extensionPublisher == 'Microsoft'
| extend eventId = tostring(customDimensions.eventId)
| extend shortMessage = iif(substring(message, 0, 4) == "Task", "Task Executed", 
                    iif(customDimensions.eventId == "AL0000JRG", "Job Queue Error",
                        iff(indexof(message, ":") <= 0, message, substring(message, 0, indexof(message, ":")))))
| where shortMessage contains _MessageFilter
| summarize count() by eventId, shortMessage
| order by count_ desc

//Custom Events in everything but Microsoft
traces
| where timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime) 
| where customDimensions.eventId startswith "AL"
| where customDimensions.extensionPublisher <> 'Microsoft'
| extend eventId = tostring(customDimensions.eventId)
| extend submsg = iif(substring(message, 0, 4) == "Task", "Task Executed", 
                    iif(customDimensions.eventId == "AL0000JRG", "Job Queue Error",
                        iff(indexof(message, ":") <= 0, message, substring(message, 0, indexof(message, ":")))))
| where submsg contains _MessageFilter
| extend extensionPublisher = tostring(customDimensions.extensionPublisher)
| summarize count() by extensionPublisher, eventId, submsg
| order by count_ desc

//Get CodeunitNames
let codeunitNames = 
    traces
    | where timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
    | where customDimensions has 'ALIFCTST0002' //Full Codeunit Run
    | extend codeunitName = tostring(customDimensions.alName)
        , codeunitId = tostring(customDimensions.alCodeunitId)
    | summarize by codeunitId, codeunitName;
//TelemetryOnTests - Overview
let Tests = 
    traces
    | where timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
    | where tostring(customDimensions.eventId) in ("ALIFCTST0001", "ALIFCTST0002", "ALIFCTST0003")
    | extend
        timestamp = timestamp
        , eventId = customDimensions.eventId
        , TestSuiteName = tostring(customDimensions.alTestSuiteName)
        , codeunitId = tostring(customDimensions.alCodeunitId)
        , MethodName = tostring(customDimensions.alMethodName)
        , StartTime = tostring(customDimensions.alStartTime)
        , EndTime = tostring(customDimensions.alEndTime)
        , NoOfReads = tostring(customDimensions.alNoOfReads)
        , NoOfSqlStatements = tostring(customDimensions.alNoOfSQLStatements)
        , DurationMs = tostring(customDimensions.alDurationMs)
        , Result = tostring(customDimensions.alResult)
    | order by timestamp desc
    | take 10000;
codeunitNames
| join kind = rightouter Tests on $left.codeunitId == $right.codeunitId
| project
        timestamp,
        eventId,
        TestSuiteName,
        codeunitId,
        codeunitName,
        MethodName,
        StartTime,
        EndTime,
        Result,
        NoOfReads,
        NoOfSqlStatements,
        DurationMs

//Get CodeunitNames
let codeunitNames = 
    traces
    | where timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
    | where customDimensions has 'ALIFCTST0002' //Full Codeunit Run
    | extend codeunitName = tostring(customDimensions.alName)
        , codeunitId = tostring(customDimensions.alCodeunitId)
    | summarize by codeunitId, codeunitName;
//Take first 2 days of the period
let BeginningOfPeriod = 
    traces
    | where timestamp between (_startTime .. _startTime + 2d)
    | where tostring(customDimensions.eventId) == "ALIFCTST0003" //One function (method)
    | extend CodeunitName = tostring(customDimensions.alName)
        , codeunitId = tostring(customDimensions.alCodeunitId)
        , MethodName = tostring(customDimensions.alMethodName)
        , NoOfSqlStatements = toint(customDimensions.alNoOfSQLStatements)
    | join kind = leftouter codeunitNames on $left.codeunitId == $right.codeunitId
    | extend FQMethod = strcat(codeunitName,'.',MethodName)
    | where FQMethod contains _MessageFilter or message  contains _MessageFilter
    | summarize avgNoOfSqlStatements=avg(NoOfSqlStatements) by FQMethod;
//Then take last 2 days of the period
let EndOfPeriod = 
    traces
    | where timestamp between (_endTime - 2d .. _endTime)
    | where tostring(customDimensions.eventId) == "ALIFCTST0003"
    | extend CodeunitName = tostring(customDimensions.alName)
        , codeunitId = tostring(customDimensions.alCodeunitId)
        , MethodName = tostring(customDimensions.alMethodName)
        , NoOfSqlStatements = toint(customDimensions.alNoOfSQLStatements)
    | join kind = leftouter codeunitNames on $left.codeunitId == $right.codeunitId
    | extend FQMethod = strcat(codeunitName,'.',MethodName)
    | where FQMethod contains _MessageFilter or message  contains _MessageFilter
    | summarize avgNoOfSqlStatements=avg(NoOfSqlStatements) by FQMethod;
//calculate difference, and take top 10 of the methods
let Difference = 
    BeginningOfPeriod
    | join kind=leftouter EndOfPeriod on $left.FQMethod == $right.FQMethod
    | extend Difference =  avgNoOfSqlStatements1 - avgNoOfSqlStatements
    | order by Difference desc
    | take 10;
//Result, getting methods only
traces
| where timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where tostring(customDimensions.eventId) == "ALIFCTST0003"
| extend
    codeunitId = tostring(customDimensions.alCodeunitId)
    , MethodName = tostring(customDimensions.alMethodName)
    , NoOfSqlStatements = toint(customDimensions.alNoOfSQLStatements)
| join kind = leftouter codeunitNames on $left.codeunitId == $right.codeunitId
| extend FQMethod = strcat(codeunitName,'.',MethodName)
| join kind=rightouter Difference on $left.FQMethod == $right.FQMethod
| project timestamp, FQMethod, NoOfSqlStatements
| summarize avgNoOfSqlStatements=avg(NoOfSqlStatements) by bin(timestamp, 1d), FQMethod
| order by FQMethod

Base_Customers
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'ALIFCTLM0002'
| extend Duration = toint(customDimensions.alDuration)
    , NoSqlStatements = toint(customDimensions.alNoSqlStatements)
    , MeasuredFunction = message
    , TenantMeasuredFunction = strcat(tenantDescription,".",message)
| where MeasuredFunction == _MeasuredFunction
| project timestamp, tenantDescription, MeasuredFunction, TenantMeasuredFunction, Duration, NoSqlStatements

Base_Customers
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'ALIFCTLM0002'
| extend Duration = toint(customDimensions.alDuration)
    , NoSqlStatements = toint(customDimensions.alNoSqlStatements)
    , MeasuredFunction = message
    , TenantMeasuredFunction = strcat(tenantDescription,".",message)
| where MeasuredFunction == _MeasuredFunction
| project timestamp, tenantDescription, MeasuredFunction, Duration, NoSqlStatements
| summarize count(), avgDuration = toint(avg(Duration)), avgNoSqlStatements = toint(avg(NoSqlStatements)) by MeasuredFunction, tenantDescription

Base_Customers
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'ALIFCTLM0002'
| extend Duration = toint(customDimensions.alDuration)
    , NoOfSqlStatements = toint(customDimensions.alNoSqlStatements)
    , MeasuredFunction = tostring(message)
    , TenantMeasuredFunction = strcat(tenantDescription,".",message)
| where MeasuredFunction == _MeasuredFunction
| summarize avgDuration = toint(avg(Duration)), avgNoSqlStatements = toint(avg(NoOfSqlStatements)) by TenantMeasuredFunction, bin(timestamp, 1d)

Base_Distri
| where eventId == "ALIFCTLM0001"
| where not (customDimensions has_any ("[Image]", "[Picture]")) //No indexes with columns for pictures/blobs
| extend TableName = tostring(customDimensions.alTableName)
    , EqualityColumns = tostring(customDimensions.alEqualityColumns)
    , InequalityColumns = tostring(customDimensions.alInequalityColumns)
    , IncludeColumns = tostring(customDimensions.alIncludeColumns)
| where TableName contains _tableFilter
| project timestamp, tenantDescription, TableName,EqualityColumns,InequalityColumns,IncludeColumns
| order by timestamp desc
| take 1000

//Missing indexes Per Index
Base_Customers
| where customDimensions.eventId == "ALIFCTLM0001"
| where not (customDimensions has_any ("[Image]", "[Picture]","[Data]")) //No indexes with columns for pictures/blobs
| extend TableName = tostring(customDimensions.alTableName)
    , EqualityColumns = tostring(customDimensions.alEqualityColumns)
    , InequalityColumns = tostring(customDimensions.alInequalityColumns)
    , IncludeColumns = tostring(customDimensions.alIncludeColumns)
| where TableName contains _tableFilter
| summarize by bin(timestamp, 1d), aadTenantId, TableName,EqualityColumns,InequalityColumns,IncludeColumns
| summarize count_ = count() by TableName,EqualityColumns,InequalityColumns,IncludeColumns
| order by count_ desc 
| project count_,  TableName,EqualityColumns,InequalityColumns,IncludeColumns

Base_Customers
| where timestamp between (_endTime - 1d .. _endTime)
| where not (customDimensions has_any ("[Image]", "[Picture]","[Data]")) //No indexes with columns for pictures/blobs
| where customDimensions contains "ALIFCTLM0001"
| extend TableName = tostring(customDimensions.alTableName)
    , EqualityColumns = tostring(customDimensions.alEqualityColumns)
    , InequalityColumns = tostring(customDimensions.alInequalityColumns)
    , IncludeColumns = tostring(customDimensions.alIncludeColumns)
| summarize by tenantDescription, TableName,EqualityColumns,InequalityColumns,IncludeColumns
| summarize count_ = count() by tenantDescription
| order by count_ desc

//Missing indexes over time
Base_Customers
| where customDimensions.eventId == "ALIFCTLM0001"
| where not (customDimensions has_any ("[Image]", "[Picture]","[Data]")) //No indexes with columns for pictures/blobs
| extend TableName = tostring(customDimensions.alTableName)
    , EqualityColumns = tostring(customDimensions.alEqualityColumns)
    , InequalityColumns = tostring(customDimensions.alInequalityColumns)
    , IncludeColumns = tostring(customDimensions.alIncludeColumns)
| summarize by bin(timestamp, 1d), tenantDescription, TableName,EqualityColumns,InequalityColumns,IncludeColumns //group all per day/tenant
| summarize count_ = count() by bin(timestamp, 1d), tenantDescription                                            //count all per day/tenant
| order by count_ desc

//Orphans

Base_Customers
| where tostring(customDimensions.eventId) in ("ALIFCTLM0003", "ALIFCTLM0004", "ALIFCTLM0005", "ALIFCTLM0006")
| extend aadTenantId = tostring(customDimensions.aadTenantId)
| project timestamp, tenantDescription, message
| order by timestamp desc

//Orphans Problems!

Base_Customers
| where tostring(customDimensions.eventId) in ("ALIFCTLM0003", "ALIFCTLM0005")
| extend NoOfOrphans = toint(customDimensions.alNoOfOrphans)
| project timestamp, tenantDescription, message, NoOfOrphans
| summarize NoOfOrphans = toint(avg(NoOfOrphans)) by bin(timestamp, 1d), tenantDescription, message
| order by timestamp desc

//Orphans Problems!

Base_Customers
| where timestamp between (_endTime - 1d .. _endTime)
| where tostring(customDimensions.eventId) in ("ALIFCTLM0003", "ALIFCTLM0005")
| extend NoOfOrphans = toint(customDimensions.alNoOfOrphans)
| project timestamp, tenantDescription, message, NoOfOrphans
| summarize NoOfOrphans = toint(avg(NoOfOrphans)) by bin(timestamp, 1d), tenantDescription , message
| order by timestamp desc

//Many Joins - base query
Base_Customers
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.sqlStatement)  // I need to analyze SQL Statement
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.alStackTrace)  // Actionable
| where customDimensions.extensionPublisher <> 'Microsoft'
| extend numberOfJoins = countof(tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement), "JOIN") //numberOfJoins
| where not(customDimensions.alObjectType in ("Page")) 
| where customDimensions.sqlStatement startswith "SELECT" 
| parse kind=regex tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement) with selectPart: string "FROM" rest: string
| extend numberOfColumnsSelected = countof(selectPart, ",") + 1 //NumberOfColumns
    , eventId = tostring(customDimensions.eventId)
    , userId = user_Id
    , ObjectType = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectType)
    , ObjectId = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectId)
    , ObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)
    , sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
    // , companyName = tostring(customDimensions.companyName)
    , clientType = tostring(customDimensions.clientType)
    , StackTrace = tostring(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
    , executionTime = customDimensions.executionTime
    , executionTimeInMS = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.executionTime))/10000
    , extensionId = customDimensions.extensionId
    // , extensionName = customDimensions.extensionName
    , extensionPublisher = customDimensions.extensionPublisher
    , componentVersion = customDimensions.componentVersion
| extend extensionIdsFromJOIN = tostring( extract_all("JOIN \"SQLDATABASE\"\\.dbo\\.\"CURRENTCOMPANY\\$.+?\\$(\\S+?)\"", sqlStatement))
| extend tablename = tostring( extract_all("FROM \"SQLDATABASE\"\\.dbo\\.\"CURRENTCOMPANY(\\$.+?)\\$\\S+?\"", sqlStatement)[0])
| project aadTenantId, tenantDescription, componentVersion, extensionPublisher, extensionName, numberOfColumnsSelected, numberOfJoins, executionTimeInMS, ObjectType, ObjectId, ObjectName, StackTrace, eventId, message, clientType, tablename, sqlStatement, extensionIdsFromJOIN
| order by numberOfColumnsSelected, numberOfJoins desc
| take 1000

//Many Joins - By Table
Base_Customers
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
| extend numberOfJoins = countof(tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement), "JOIN") 
| where not(customDimensions.alObjectType in ("Page"))
| where customDimensions.sqlStatement startswith "SELECT"
| parse kind=regex tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement) with selectPart: string "FROM" rest: string
| extend numberOfColumnsSelected = countof(selectPart, ",") + 1
    , eventId = tostring(customDimensions.eventId)
    , userId = user_Id
    , ObjectType = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectType)
    , ObjectId = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectId)
    , ObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)
    , sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
    // , companyName = tostring(customDimensions.companyName)
    , clientType = tostring(customDimensions.clientType)
    , StackTrace = tostring(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
    , executionTime = customDimensions.executionTime
    , executionTimeInMS = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.executionTime))/10000
    , extensionId = customDimensions.extensionId
    , extensionPublisher = customDimensions.extensionPublisher
    , componentVersion = tostring(customDimensions.componentVersion)
| where numberOfColumnsSelected > 20
| extend extensionIdsFromJOIN = tostring( extract_all("JOIN \"SQLDATABASE\"\\.dbo\\.\"CURRENTCOMPANY\\$.+?\\$(\\S+?)\"", sqlStatement))
| extend tablename = tostring( extract_all("FROM \"SQLDATABASE\"\\.dbo\\.\"CURRENTCOMPANY(\\$.+?)\\$\\S+?\"", sqlStatement)[0])
// | project TenantId, extensionPublisher, extensionName, companyName, numberOfColumnsSelected, numberOfJoins, executionTimeInMS, ObjectType, ObjectId, ObjectName, clientType, StackTrace, eventId, message, tablename, sqlStatement, extensionIdsFromJOIN, componentVersion
| summarize avgExecutionTime = toint(avg(executionTimeInMS)), avgnumberOfColumns = toint(avg(numberOfColumnsSelected)), count = count() by aadTenantId, tenantDescription, componentVersion, extensionName
| order by avgnumberOfColumns desc

//Many Joins - By Table
Base_Customers
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
| extend numberOfJoins = countof(tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement), "JOIN") 
| where not(customDimensions.alObjectType in ("Page"))
| where customDimensions.sqlStatement startswith "SELECT"
| parse kind=regex tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement) with selectPart: string "FROM" rest: string
| extend numberOfColumnsSelected = countof(selectPart, ",") + 1
    , eventId = tostring(customDimensions.eventId)
    , TenantId = strcat(customDimensions.aadTenantId)
    , userId = user_Id
    , ObjectType = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectType)
    , ObjectId = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectId)
    , ObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)
    , sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
    , companyName = tostring(customDimensions.companyName)
    , clientType = tostring(customDimensions.clientType)
    , StackTrace = tostring(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
    , executionTime = customDimensions.executionTime
    , executionTimeInMS = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.executionTime))/10000
    , extensionId = customDimensions.extensionId
| extend extensionIdsFromJOIN = tostring( extract_all("JOIN \"SQLDATABASE\"\\.dbo\\.\"CURRENTCOMPANY\\$.+?\\$(\\S+?)\"", sqlStatement))
| extend tablename = tostring( extract_all("FROM \"SQLDATABASE\"\\.dbo\\.\"CURRENTCOMPANY(\\$.+?)\\$\\S+?\"", sqlStatement)[0])
| project TenantId, extensionPublisher, extensionName, companyName, numberOfColumnsSelected, numberOfJoins, executionTimeInMS, ObjectType, ObjectId, ObjectName, clientType, StackTrace, eventId, message, tablename, sqlStatement, extensionIdsFromJOIN
| summarize avgExecutionTime = toint(avg(executionTimeInMS)), avgnumberOfColumns = toint(avg(numberOfColumnsSelected)), count = count() by tablename
| order by ['count'] desc 
| take 1000

Base_Customers
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.sqlStatement) 
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.alStackTrace) // Actionable
| where customDimensions.extensionPublisher <> "Microsoft"
| where customDimensions.sqlStatement contains "SELECT TOP 1 NULL" //IsEmpty
    and customDimensions.sqlStatement contains "UPDLOCK"           //Which is locking
    and customDimensions.sqlStatement startswith "SELECT"
| where not(customDimensions.alObjectType in ("Page"))
| parse kind=regex tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement) with selectPart: string "FROM" rest: string
| extend numberOfColumnsSelected = countof(selectPart, ",") + 1
    , eventId = tostring(customDimensions.eventId)
    , userId = user_Id
    , ObjectType = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectType)
    , ObjectId = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectId)
    , ObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)
    , sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
    , companyName = tostring(customDimensions.companyName)
    , clientType = tostring(customDimensions.clientType)
    , StackTrace = tostring(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
    , executionTime = customDimensions.executionTime
    , executionTimeInMS = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.executionTime))/10000
    , extensionId = customDimensions.extensionId
    , extensionPublisher = customDimensions.extensionPublisher
    , componentVersion = tostring(customDimensions.componentVersion)
| extend tablename = tostring( extract_all("FROM \"SQLDATABASE\"\\.dbo\\.\"CURRENTCOMPANY(\\$.+?)\\$\\S+?\"", sqlStatement)[0])
| project aadTenantId, companyName, componentVersion, extensionPublisher, extensionName
    , executionTimeInMS, ObjectType, ObjectId, ObjectName, StackTrace, eventId, message, clientType, tablename, sqlStatement,customDimensions
| take 1000

// Any IsEmpty that we can find in Telemetry that is locking
 // By ExtensionName

Base_Customers
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.sqlStatement) 
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.alStackTrace) // Actionable
| where customDimensions.extensionPublisher <> "Microsoft"
| where customDimensions.sqlStatement contains "SELECT TOP 1 NULL"
    and customDimensions.sqlStatement contains "UPDLOCK"
    and customDimensions.sqlStatement startswith "SELECT"
| where not(customDimensions.alObjectType in ("Page"))
| parse kind=regex tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement) with selectPart: string "FROM" rest: string
| extend numberOfColumnsSelected = countof(selectPart, ",") + 1
    , eventId = tostring(customDimensions.eventId)
    , userId = user_Id
    , ObjectType = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectType)
    , ObjectId = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectId)
    , ObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)
    , sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
    , companyName = tostring(customDimensions.companyName)
    , clientType = tostring(customDimensions.clientType)
    , StackTrace = tostring(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
    , executionTime = customDimensions.executionTime
    , executionTimeInMS = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.executionTime))/10000
    , extensionId = customDimensions.extensionId
    , extensionPublisher = customDimensions.extensionPublisher
    , componentVersion = tostring(customDimensions.componentVersion)
| extend extensionIdsFromJOIN = tostring( extract_all("JOIN \"SQLDATABASE\"\\.dbo\\.\"CURRENTCOMPANY\\$.+?\\$(\\S+?)\"", sqlStatement))
| extend tablename = tostring( extract_all("FROM \"SQLDATABASE\"\\.dbo\\.\"CURRENTCOMPANY(\\$.+?)\\$\\S+?\"", sqlStatement)[0])
// | project TenantId, extensionPublisher, extensionName, companyName, numberOfColumnsSelected, executionTimeInMS, ObjectType, ObjectId, ObjectName, StackTrace, eventId, message, clientType, tablename, sqlStatement, extensionIdsFromJOIN
| summarize count = count() by tenantDescription,  tostring(extensionName), componentVersion
| order by count desc

Base_Customers
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.sqlStatement) 
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.alStackTrace)           // Actionable
| where customDimensions.extensionPublisher <> "Microsoft"
| where customDimensions.sqlStatement contains "SELECT SUM" //Calcsums
    and customDimensions.sqlStatement contains "UPDLOCK"    //Which is locking
    and customDimensions.sqlStatement startswith "SELECT"
| where not(customDimensions.alObjectType in ("Page"))
| parse kind=regex tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement) with selectPart: string "FROM" rest: string
| extend numberOfColumnsSelected = countof(selectPart, ",") + 1
    , eventId = tostring(customDimensions.eventId)
    , userId = user_Id
    , ObjectType = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectType)
    , ObjectId = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectId)
    , ObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)
    , sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
    , companyName = tostring(customDimensions.companyName)
    , clientType = tostring(customDimensions.clientType)
    , StackTrace = tostring(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
    , executionTime = customDimensions.executionTime
    , executionTimeInMS = toreal(totimespan(customDimensions.executionTime))/10000
    , extensionId = customDimensions.extensionId
    , extensionPublisher = customDimensions.extensionPublisher
    , componentVersion = tostring(customDimensions.componentVersion)
| extend tablename = tostring( extract_all("FROM \"SQLDATABASE\"\\.dbo\\.\"CURRENTCOMPANY(\\$.+?)\\$\\S+?\"", sqlStatement)[0])
| project aadTenantId, companyName, componentVersion, extensionName, executionTimeInMS, ObjectType, ObjectId, ObjectName, StackTrace, eventId, message, clientType, tablename, sqlStatement,  customDimensions
| take 1000

// Any IsEmpty that we can find in Telemetry that is locking
 // By ExtensionName

Base_Customers
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.sqlStatement) 
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.alStackTrace) // Actionable
| where customDimensions.extensionPublisher <> "Microsoft"

// DeadLocks - by Source Process

Base_Customers
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'RT0028'
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.aadTenantId) // filter away signal from Docker sandboxes
| where customDimensions.alObjectId != '0' 
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.alObjectId)
| extend ObjectType = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectType)
    , ObjectId = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectId)
    , ObjectName = tostring(customDimensions.alObjectName)
    , sqlStatement = tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement)
    , companyName = tostring(customDimensions.companyName)        
    , numberOfJoins = countof(tostring(customDimensions.sqlStatement), "JOIN")
    , EventId = tostring(customDimensions.eventId)
    , StackTrace = tostring(customDimensions.alStackTrace)
    , componentVersion = tostring(customDimensions.componentVersion)
    , userId = user_Id
| extend operationType = case(
    sqlStatement startswith "UPDATE", "UPDATE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "DELETE", "DELETE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "BeginTransaction", "BEGIN_TRANS"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "INSERT INTO", "INSERT"
    , sqlStatement startswith "SELECT", "SELECT"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "IF EXISTS \\(SELECT (.*)\\) SELECT", "SELECT'"
    , sqlStatement has "SELECT NEXT VALUE FOR", "SELECT_SEQUENCE_VALUE"
    , sqlStatement has "SELECT @@SPID", "SELECT_SPID"
    , sqlStatement matches regex "(.*)WITH", "SELECT"
    , sqlStatement startswith "CREATE TABLE", "CREATE_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "ALTER TABLE", "ALTER_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "exec sp_rename", "RENAME_TABLE" 
    , sqlStatement matches regex "(.*)DROP TABLE", "DROP_TABLE"
    , sqlStatement startswith "SET LOCK_TIMEOUT", "SET_LOCK_TIMEOUT"
    , sqlStatement has "sp_getapplock", "GET_APP_LOCK"
    , "UNKNOWN"
    ) 
| parse kind=regex sqlStatement with selectPart: string "FROM \"SQLDATABASE\".dbo.\"CURRENTCOMPANY\\$" tablename: string "\\$" space: string
| extend splitStacktrace = split(customDimensions.alStackTrace, "\n")
| extend lengthStacktrace = array_length(splitStacktrace)
| extend
    topOfStackline = tostring(splitStacktrace[0]),
    bottomOfStackline = tostring(splitStacktrace[lengthStacktrace - 1])
| extend topOfStackObjectName = extract('\\\"?([^\\\"]+)\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackObjectType = extract('\\(([a-zA-Z]+) \\d+\\)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackObjectId = extract('\\([a-zA-Z]+ (\\d+)\\)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackLineNumber = extract(' line (\\d+)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackExtensionName = case (
    isnotempty(topOfStackLineNumber), extract('line \\d+ - (.+) by', 1, topOfStackline),
    extract(' - (.+) by', 1, topOfStackline)
    )
| extend topOfStackPublisher = extract('.+ by (.+)', 1, topOfStackline)
| extend topOfStackWhatWasCalled = case(
    isnotempty(topOfStackLineNumber), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) line', 1, topOfStackline),
    isnotempty(topOfStackExtensionName), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) -(.+) by (.+)', 1, topOfStackline),
    extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+)', 1, topOfStackline)
    )
| extend bottomOfStackObjectName = extract('\\\"?([^\\\"]+)\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackObjectType = extract('\\(([a-zA-Z]+) \\d+\\)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackObjectId = extract('\\([a-zA-Z]+ (\\d+)\\)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackLineNumber = extract(' line (\\d+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackExtensionName = case (
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackLineNumber), extract('line \\d+ - (.+) by', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    extract(' - (.+) by', 1, bottomOfStackline)
    )
| extend bottomOfStackPublisher = extract('.+ by (.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackWhatWasCalled = case(
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackLineNumber), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) line', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackExtensionName), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) -(.+) by (.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
    )
| extend SourceProcess = strcat(bottomOfStackWhatWasCalled , " - ", bottomOfStackObjectType, " ", bottomOfStackObjectId, " ", bottomOfStackObjectName, " (", bottomOfStackExtensionName, ")")
    , LockingObject = strcat(topOfStackObjectType, " '", topOfStackObjectName,"'")
    , LockingObjectId = tostring(topOfStackObjectId)
    , LockingObjectMethod = tostring(topOfStackWhatWasCalled)
    , LockingObjectExtension = tostring(topOfStackExtensionName)
| where SourceProcess contains _sourceObjectFilter
| where LockingObject contains _SlowObjectFilter
| project
    timestamp,
    aadTenantId,
    tenantDescription,
    ObjectType,
    ObjectId,
    ObjectName,
    operationType,
    numberOfJoins,
    LockingObject,
    LockingObjectId,
    LockingObjectMethod,
    LockingObjectExtension,
    topOfStackPublisher,
    SourceProcess,
    StackTrace,
    customDimensions,
    componentVersion,
    sqlStatement
| extend ExtensionName = iif(LockingObjectExtension contains "iFacto" 
        or LockingObjectExtension contains "Single"
        or LockingObjectExtension contains "Distri"
        or LockingObjectExtension contains "Commerce"
        or topOfStackPublisher contains "Microsoft"
            , LockingObjectExtension, 'PTE')
| summarize count = count() by componentVersion, tostring(SourceProcess), tostring(tenantDescription), tostring(ExtensionName), tostring(LockingObject), tostring(LockingObjectId), tostring(LockingObjectMethod),tostring(operationType)
| project count, tenantDescription, componentVersion, SourceProcess, LockingObject, operationType, ExtensionName
| order by ['count'],SourceProcess desc

traces
| where timestamp >= ago(30d)
| where customDimensions has 'AL0000DGF'
| where customDimensions.alTag has_any (_BCPTTag)
| where customDimensions has _codeunitName
| where customDimensions.alOperation == 'Scenario'
| where customDimensions.alStatus == 'Success'
| extend RunId = tostring(customDimensions.alRunID)
    , Suite = tostring(customDimensions.alCode)
    , CodeunitName = tostring(customDimensions.alCodeunitName)
    , Operation = tostring(customDimensions.alOperation)
    , Tag = iif(customDimensions.alTag contains_cs "PTE", "PTE", 
                iif(customDimensions.alTag contains "Focus", "CustSpecific"
                    , tostring(customDimensions.alTag)))
    , Version = tostring(customDimensions.alVersion)
    , DurationInMs = toint(customDimensions.alDurationInMs)
    , NoOfSqlStatements = toint(customDimensions.alNoOfSqlStatements)
    , alStatus = tostring(customDimensions.alStatus)
    , alMessage = tostring(customDimensions.alMessage)
    , Week = strcat(format_datetime(timestamp, "yyyy"),'-',week_of_year(timestamp))
| order by timestamp desc
| summarize count = count(), avgNoOfSqlStatements = toint(avg(NoOfSqlStatements)), avgDuration = toint(avg(DurationInMs)) by bin(timestamp, 1d), CodeunitName, Tag
| order by timestamp, Tag, CodeunitName

    )

    )

            iif( bottomOfStackExtensionName contains "iFacto"

                or bottomOfStackExtensionName contains "Commerce"
                    , bottomOfStackExtensionName, 'PTE')))

    , SlowObject = strcat(topOfStackWhatWasCalled , " - ", topOfStackObjectType, " ", topOfStackObjectId, " ", topOfStackObjectName, " (", topOfStackExtensionName, ")")

| extend SlowObject = iif(strlen( SlowObject) >= 10, SlowObject, SourceProcess)

| where SlowObject contains _SlowObjectFilter

    extract(' - (.+) by', 1, bottomOfStackline)
    )

            iif( bottomOfStackExtensionName contains "iFacto" 
                or bottomOfStackExtensionName contains "Single"

                or bottomOfStackExtensionName contains "Commerce"
                    , bottomOfStackExtensionName, 'PTE')))
| extend bottomOfStackPublisher = extract('.+ by (.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
| extend bottomOfStackWhatWasCalled = case(
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackLineNumber), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) line', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    isnotempty(bottomOfStackExtensionName), extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+) -(.+) by (.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline),
    extract('\\\"?[^\\\"]+\\\"?\\([a-zA-Z]+ \\d+\\).(.+)', 1, bottomOfStackline)
    )

| extend SourceProcess = strcat(bottomOfStackWhatWasCalled , " - ", bottomOfStackObjectType, " ", bottomOfStackObjectId, " ", bottomOfStackObjectName, " (", bottomOfStackExtensionName, ")")
    , SlowObject = strcat(topOfStackWhatWasCalled , " - ", topOfStackObjectType, " ", topOfStackObjectId, " ", topOfStackObjectName, " (", topOfStackExtensionName, ")")
| extend SourceProcess = iif(strlen( SourceProcess) >= 10, SourceProcess, trim(@"[^\w]+",strcat(splitStacktrace[0], " ", splitStacktrace[1])))
| extend SlowObject = iif(strlen( SlowObject) >= 10, SlowObject, SourceProcess)
| where SourceProcess contains _sourceObjectFilter
| where SlowObject contains _SlowObjectFilter
| summarize avgElapsedtime = avg(elapsedTimeInMS) by SlowObject

traces
| where timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where isnotempty(customDimensions.eventId)
| extend submsg = iif(substring(message, 0, 4) == "Task", "Task Executed", 
                    iif(customDimensions.eventId == "AL0000JRG", "Job Queue Error",
                        iff(indexof(message, ":") <= 0, message, substring(message, 0, indexof(message, ":")))))
| extend eventId = customDimensions.eventId
    , status = iif(submsg has "called" 
                    or submsg has "executed"
                        or submsg has 'executed'
                            or submsg has 'succeeded'
                                or submsg has 'rendered'
                                    or submsg has 'successfully'
                                        or submsg has 'taken', "success",
                    iif(submsg has "error"
                            or submsg has 'fail'
                                or submsg has 'failed'
                                    or submsg has 'deadlock'
                                        or submsg has 'timed out',"error",
                        iif(message has 'exceeded', 'too slow',
                            "unknown")))
| where submsg contains _MessageFilter
| extend eventDescription = strcat("(",eventId,") ",submsg)
| summarize count = count() by tostring(eventId), tostring(eventDescription)
| order by ['count'] desc

| where customDimensions.eventId == 'AL0000DGF'
| where customDimensions.alOperation == 'Scenario'
| extend CodeunitName = tostring(customDimensions.alCodeunitName)
| summarize by CodeunitName

traces
| where customDimensions has 'AL0000DGF'
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'AL0000DGF'
| extend tag = iif(customDimensions.alTag contains_cs "PTE", "PTE", 
                iif(customDimensions.alTag contains "Focus", "CustSpecific"
                    , tostring(customDimensions.alTag)))
| summarize by tag

traces
| where timestamp >= ago(5d)
| where customDimensions.eventId == 'ALIFCTLM0002'
| extend MeasuredFunction = tostring(message)
| summarize by MeasuredFunction
